description: WhatsApp is reportedly developing a feature to support motion photo sharing in chats and channels. This would allow users to share short clips with audio and video captured by certain smartphones when taking photos. Spotted on the latest Android beta, the feature is also expected to enable iPhone users to see them as Live Photos on WhatsApp for iOS in the future.
title: WhatsApp Reportedly Working on Support for Motion Photos on Android

description: Honor Pad X9a has been launched in Malaysia, featuring an 11.5-inch LCD screen with a 120Hz refresh rate. Equipped with a Snapdragon 685 chip, it also packs an 8,300mAh battery. It runs on Android 15 with MagicOS 9.0, and features a 5-megapixel front camera and an 8-megapixel rear camera.
title: Honor Pad X9a With 11.5-inch LCD Screen, Snapdragon 685 SoC Launched

description: Oppo Find X8s and Oppo Find X8s+ specifications have surfaced online ahead of their launch. Both models will feature an upgraded processor from last year’s Oppo Find X8 series, larger batteries, and 80W wired charging support, according to a tipster on Weibo. Oppo is expected to unveil these devices next month, alongside the Find X8 Ultra.
title: Oppo Find X8s, Find X8+ Specifications Leaked; Said to Arrive With Dimensity 9400+ Chip

description: IPL 2025 is here, and it will feature 74 matches in total this year, which will be played in 13 different cities in India. The IPL 2025 season has already kickstarted, and the tournament will end on May 25, 2025. Here’s everything you need to know about the IPL 2025 live streaming details: all the match details, full schedule, how to watch it for free, and more.
title: IPL 2025 Live Streaming for Free: How to Watch Kolkata Knight Riders vs Royal Challengers Bengaluru IPL Match on Mobile and Smart TV

description: iPhone 17 series has been spotted in a fresh set of images showcasing dummy units that hint at changes to the rear panel design. Successors to the iPhone 16 Pro models are expected to feature larger camera modules and a glass-aluminium back. Reports suggest the regular iPhone 17 may retain its design, while an iPhone 17 Air could replace the iPhone 16 Plus.
title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max Glass-Aluminium Rear Panel Design Spotted on New Dummy Units

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge has appeared on a performance benchmarking site, ahead of its anticipated launch in select markets. It is set to join the Galaxy S25 lineup introduced earlier this year and will feature a custom Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chip. Meanwhile, Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 FE, powered by the Exynos 1580 chipset, has also surfaced on Geekbench.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, Galaxy Tab S10 FE Surface on Geekbench Ahead of Debut

description: Tencent launched its T1 reasoning model, intensifying competition in China's AI sector. Announced via WeChat, the upgraded model features faster responses and improved capabilities for processing lengthy text documents. The launch coincides with heightened rivalry following DeepSeek’s release of models offering comparable or superior performance to Western systems at significantly lower costs.
title: Tencent T1 Reasoning Model Launched Amid Growing AI Competition in China

description: SEBI has directed registered intermediaries advertising on social media platforms like Google and Meta to use the contact details shared with the market regulator, such as email IDs and mobile numbers. This step aims to combat rising securities market frauds observed on platforms like YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, X (formerly Twitter), Telegram, and Google Play Store, ensuring greater accountability and reducing fraudulent activities in the market.
title: SEBI Directs Intermediaries to Use Registered Contact Details for Advertising on Social Media Platforms
